snippet: Viewers of NBC’s coverage will be encouraged to talk about the Games on Facebook, and Facebook users will be reminded to watch the coverage on NBC.
abstract: NBC Universal is teaming up with Facebook for coverage of the Olympic Games in London in a collaboration that will use television and social media to get viewers more involved; data from Facebook will inform television coverage, creating a conversation that will reflect what is being said online in an effort to draw more viewers.
lead_paragraph: Viewers of NBC’s coverage will be encouraged to talk about the Games on Facebook, and Facebook users will be reminded to watch the coverage on NBC.

headline.seo: NBC and Facebook to Announce Olympics Partnership
headline.main: NBC and Facebook to Announce Olympics Partnership
headline.print_headline: NBC Tie-up To Facebook At Olympics
